problem_text: In \odot B, m \angle L B M = 3 x and m \angle L B Q = 4 x + 61. What is the measure of \angle P B Q?
compact_text: In \odot B, m \angle LBM = 3x and m \angle LBQ = 4x+61. What is the measure of \angle PBQ?
annotat_text: In $\odot B$, $m \angle LBM = 3x$ and $m \angle LBQ = 4x + 61$. What is the measure of $\angle PBQ$?
